title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse: Bundle Edition - FitGirl
description:
Dragon Ball Xenoverse: Bundle Edition (v1.07 + DLCs, MULTI9) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless]



::Information::


Release Date: February 26, 2015 (Bundle Edition - June 9, 2015)
Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, 3D
Developer: Dimps Corporation
Publisher: Bandai Namco Games
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 89% of user reviews are positive (based on 6,949 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Russian, Portuguese-Brazil
Audio Language: English, Japanese
Crack: built-in (PLAZA/CODEX)


::Repack Features::


Based on Dragonball.Xenoverse.Bundle.Edition-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-dragonball.xenoverse.bundle.edition.iso (10,206,609,408 bytes)
The following DLCs included: GT Pack 1, GT Pack 2, Resurrection `F' pack & MOVIE COSTUMES PACK
Game version is v1.07
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation - movies are in native 1080p
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
The smallest lossless repack available (compressed from 9.5 to 7.1 GB)
Installation takes: ~25 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~40 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~1 hour 30 minutes on 2-cores CPU. You've been warned.
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 10 GB
Language can be changed by running language.changer.exe in game folder
Repack by FitGirl
